info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Mecklenburg and eastern York Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of York to near Rock Hill. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rock Hill, Fort Mill, Tega Cay, Newport, Lesslie, Steele Creek, Catawba, Carowinds, Lake Wylie and Southwest Charlotte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
